import React , {useEffect} from "react"; import ChartistGraph from "react-chartist"; import ChartistTooltip from 'chartist-plugin-tooltips-updated'; import Chartist from "react-chartist"; // react-bootstrap components import { Badge, Button, Card, Navbar, Nav, Table, Container, Row, Col, Form, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, } from "react-bootstrap"; const data1 = { labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'], series: [ [20000, 30000, 35000, 32000, 40000, 42000, 50000, 62000, 80000, 94000, 100000, 120000]], }; var options1 = { showArea: false, fullWidth: true, lineSmooth: false, chartPadding: { right: 20, left: 10 }, axisX: { showGrid: true, labelInterpolationFnc: function(value) { return value.split('').slice(0, 3).join(''); }, }, lineSmooth: true, showLine: true, showPoint: true, fullWidth: true, } const plugins = [ ChartistTooltip() ] function Dashboard(page) { var todo2s; var questions = new Array(); for(var i=0; i { page.todos1.score_tiles_data.map(todo => {todo.value} {todo.display_header} ) } Day wise Usage
Top Viewing Products
Day wise Usage
Top Viewing Products
); } export default Dashboard;
